instruction: brown sugar, milk, vanilla, nuts, butter, bite size shredded rice biscuits
response: Title: No-Bake Nut Cookies. Ingredients: 1 c. firmly packed brown sugar, 1/2 c. evaporated milk, 1/2 tsp. vanilla, 1/2 c. broken nuts (pecans), 2 Tbsp. butter margarine, 3 1/2 c. bite size shredded rice biscuits. Directions: In heavy 2-quart saucepan, mix brown sugar, nuts, evaporated milk butter margarine. Stir medium heat mixture bubbles top. Boil stir 5 minutes more. Take heat. Stir vanilla cereal; mix well. Using 2 teaspoons, drop shape 30 clusters wax paper. Let stand firm, 30 minutes.

instruction: beef, chicken breasts, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream
response: Title: Jewell Ball'S Chicken. Ingredients: 1 small jar chipped beef, cut up, 4 boned chicken breasts, 1 cream mushroom soup, 1 carton sour cream. Directions: Place chipped beef baking dish. Place chicken beef. Mix soup cream together; pour chicken. Bake, uncovered, 275 deg 3 hours.

instruction: frozen corn, cream cheese, butter, garlic powder, salt, pepper
response: Title: Creamy Corn. Ingredients: 2 (16 oz.) pkg. frozen corn, 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, cubed, 1/3 c. butter, cubed, 1/2 tsp. garlic powder, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp. pepper. Directions: In slow cooker, combine ingredients. Cover cook low 4 hours heated cheese melted. Stir serving. Yields 6 servings.

instruction: chicken, chicken gravy, cream of mushroom soup, shredded cheese
response: Title: Chicken Funny. Ingredients: 1 large chicken, 2 (10 1/2 oz.) cans chicken gravy, 1 (10 1/2 oz.) cream mushroom soup, 1 (6 oz.) box Stove Top stuffing, 4 oz. shredded cheese. Directions: Boil debone chicken. Put bite size pieces average size square casserole dish. Pour gravy cream mushroom soup chicken; level. Make stuffing according instructions box (do moist). Put stuffing chicken gravy; level. Sprinkle shredded cheese bake 350 deg approximately 20 minutes golden bubbly.

instruction: peanut butter, graham cracker crumbs, butter, powdered sugar, chocolate chips
response: Title: Reeses Cups(Candy). Ingredients: 1 c. peanut butter, 3/4 c. graham cracker crumbs, 1 c. melted butter, 1 lb. (3 1/2 c.) powdered sugar, 1 large pkg. chocolate chips. Directions: Combine ingredients press 13 x 9-inch ungreased pan. Melt chocolate chips spread mixture. Refrigerate 20 minutes cut pieces chocolate gets hard. Keep refrigerator.

instruction: baking potatoes, extra lean ground beef, butter, milk, salt, pepper, Cheddar cheese, bacon, green onion, sour cream
response: Title: Cheeseburger Potato Soup. Ingredients: 6 baking potatoes, 1 lb. extra lean ground beef, 2/3 c. butter margarine, 6 c. milk, 3/4 tsp. salt, 1/2 tsp. pepper, 1 1/2 c (6 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese, divided, 12 sliced bacon, cooked, crumbled divided, 4 green onion, chopped divided, 1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream (optional). Directions: Wash potatoes; prick times fork. Microwave wet paper towel covering potatoes high 6-8 minutes. The potatoes soft, ready eat. Let cool handle. Cut half lengthwise; scoop pulp reserve. Discard shells. Brown ground beef done. Drain grease meat. Set aside done. Meat added later. Melt butter large kettle low heat; add flour, stirring smooth. Cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Gradually add milk; cook medium heat, stirring constantly, thickened bubbly. Stir potato, ground beef, salt, pepper, 1 cup cheese, 2 tablespoons green onion 1/2 cup bacon. Cook heated (do boil). Stir sour cream desired; cook heated (do boil). Sprinkle remaining cheese, bacon green onions.

instruction: sugar, butter, egg, buttermilk, flour, salt, soda, buttermilk, rhubarb, vanilla
response: Title: Rhubarb Coffee Cake. Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. sugar, 1/2 c. butter, 1 egg, 1 c. buttermilk, 2 c. flour, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. soda, 1 c. buttermilk, 2 c. rhubarb, finely cut, 1 tsp. vanilla. Directions: Cream sugar butter. Add egg beat well. To creamed butter, sugar egg, add alternately buttermilk mixture flour, salt soda. Mix well. Add rhubarb vanilla. Pour greased 9 x 13-inch pan add Topping.

instruction: cream-style corn, whole kernel corn, crackers, egg, butter, pepper
response: Title: Scalloped Corn. Ingredients: 1 cream-style corn, 1 kernel corn, 1/2 pkg. (approximately 20) saltine crackers, crushed, 1 egg, beaten, 6 tsp. butter, divided, pepper taste. Directions: Mix cans corn, crackers, egg, 2 teaspoons melted butter pepper place buttered baking dish. Dot remaining 4 teaspoons butter. Bake 350 deg 1 hour.

instruction: tomatoes, water, onions, Worcestershire sauce, green peppers, oil
response: Title: Nolan'S Pepper Steak. Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. round steak (1-inch thick), cut strips, 1 drained tomatoes, cut (save liquid), 1 3/4 c. water, 1/2 c. onions, 1 1/2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce, 2 green peppers, diced, 1/4 c. oil. Directions: Roll steak strips flour. Brown skillet. Salt pepper. Combine tomato liquid, water, onions browned steak. Cover simmer quarter hours. Uncover stir Worcestershire sauce. Add tomatoes, green peppers simmer 5 minutes. Serve hot cooked rice.

instruction: pineapple, condensed milk, lemons, pecans, graham cracker crusts
response: Title: Millionaire Pie. Ingredients: 1 large container Cool Whip, 1 large crushed pineapple, 1 condensed milk, 3 lemons, 1 c. pecans, 2 graham cracker crusts. Directions: Empty Cool Whip bowl. Drain juice pineapple. Mix Cool Whip pineapple. Add condensed milk. Squeeze lemons, remove seeds add Cool Whip pineapple. Chop nuts small pieces add mixture. Stir ingredients mix well. Pour graham cracker crust. Use crust cover pie. Chill overnight. Makes 2 pies.

instruction: dark sweet pitted cherries, ginger ale, flavor gelatin, boiling water, almond extract, marshmallows
response: Title: Double Cherry Delight. Ingredients: 1 (17 oz.) dark sweet pitted cherries, 1/2 c. ginger ale, 1 (6 oz.) pkg. Jell-O cherry flavor gelatin, 2 c. boiling water, 1/8 tsp. almond extract, 1 c. miniature marshmallows. Directions: Drain cherries, measuring syrup. Cut cherries half. Add ginger ale water syrup 1 1/2 cups. Dissolve gelatin boiling water. Add measured liquid almond extract. Chill thick. Fold marshmallows cherries. Spoon 6-cup mold. Chill firm, 4 hours overnight. Unmold. Makes 5 1/3 cups.

instruction: powdered sugar, butter, peanut butter, paraffin, chocolate chips
response: Title: Buckeye Candy. Ingredients: 1 box powdered sugar, 8 oz. soft butter, 1 (8 oz.) peanut butter, paraffin, 12 oz. chocolate chips. Directions: Mix sugar, butter peanut butter. Roll balls place cookie sheet. Set freezer 30 minutes. Melt chocolate chips paraffin double boiler. Using toothpick, dip balls 3/4 way chocolate chip paraffin mixture look like buckeyes.

instruction: chicken, flour, barbecue sauce
response: Title: Quick Barbecue Wings. Ingredients: chicken wings (as need dinner), flour, barbecue sauce (your choice). Directions: Clean wings. Flour fry done. Place fried chicken wings microwave bowl. Stir barbecue sauce. Microwave High (stir once) 4 minutes.

instruction: taco sauce, sour cream, cream cheese, ground beef, taco seasoning, shredded lettuce, tomato, onion, green pepper, Cheddar cheese
response: Title: Taco Salad Chip Dip. Ingredients: 8 oz. Ortega taco sauce, 8 oz. sour cream, 8 oz. cream cheese, 1 lb. ground beef, 1 pkg. taco seasoning, shredded lettuce, 1 large diced tomato, 1 medium diced onion, 1 large diced green pepper, shredded Colby Cheddar cheese. Directions: Mix taco sauce, sour cream cream cheese. Spread pizza pan. Brown meat. Drain fat add taco seasoning. Spread cream mixture. Layer raw vegetables. Top cheese. Serve chips.

instruction: pie filling, pineapple, condensed milk, lemon juice
response: Title: Pink Stuff(Frozen Dessert). Ingredients: 1 pie filling (cherry strawberry), 1 crushed pineapple, drained, 1 sweetened condensed milk, 1 (8 oz.) container thawed whipped topping, 2 Tbsp. lemon juice. Directions: Mix ingredients together. Pour 9 x 13-inch pan. Freeze firm. Allow set approximately 15 minutes serving.

instruction: shell, cleaned strawberries, water, cornstarch, sugar, salt, strawberry jello
response: Title: Fresh Strawberry Pie. Ingredients: 1 baked pie shell, 1 qt. cleaned strawberries, 1 1/2 c. water, 4 Tbsp. cornstarch, 1 c. sugar, 1/8 tsp. salt, 4 Tbsp. strawberry jello. Directions: Mix water, cornstarch, sugar salt saucepan. Stir constantly boil clear. Remove heat stir jello. Set aside cool. But don't allow set. Layer strawberries baked crust. Pour cooled glaze over. Continue layering berries glaze. Refrigerate. Serve whipped cream.

instruction: chocolate fudge cake, white cake, Wesson oil
response: Title: Easy German Chocolate Cake. Ingredients: 1/2 pkg. chocolate fudge cake mix pudding 1 Jiffy mix, 1/2 pkg. white cake mix pudding 1 Jiffy mix, 1/4 c. Wesson oil. Directions: Mix according directions add oil. Bake 9 x 13-inch pan.

instruction: broccoli, bacon, green onions, raisins, mayonnaise, vinegar, sugar
response: Title: Broccoli Salad. Ingredients: 1 large head broccoli (about 1 1/2 lb.), 10 slices bacon, cooked crumbled, 5 green onions, sliced 1/4 c. chopped red onion, 1/2 c. raisins, 1 c. mayonnaise, 2 Tbsp. vinegar, 1/4 c. sugar. Directions: Trim large leaves broccoli remove tough ends lower stalks. Wash broccoli thoroughly. Cut florets stems bite-size pieces. Place large bowl. Add bacon, onions raisins. Combine remaining ingredients, stirring well. Add dressing broccoli mixture toss gently. Cover refrigerate 2 3 hours. Makes 6 servings.

instruction: frozen strawberries, pineapple, bananas, pecans, strawberry, boiling water, sour cream
response: Title: Strawberry Whatever. Ingredients: 1 lb. frozen strawberries juice, 1 small crushed pineapple, 3 ripe bananas, 1 c. chopped pecans, 1 large pkg. strawberry Jell-O, 1 1/2 c. boiling water, 1 pt. sour cream. Directions: Mix Jell-O boiling water. Add strawberries, pineapple, crushed bananas nuts. Spread 1/2 mixture 13 x 6 1/2-inch pan. Allow gel freezer 30 minutes. Add layer sour cream, remaining mixture top. Gel serve.

instruction: sugar, shortening, applesauce, soda, cinnamon, flour, raisins, nuts
response: Title: Eggless Milkless Applesauce Cake. Ingredients: 3/4 c. sugar, 1/2 c. shortening, 1 1/2 c. applesauce, 3 level tsp. soda, 1 tsp. each: cinnamon, cloves nutmeg, 2 c. sifted flour, 1 c. raisins, 1 c. nuts. Directions: Mix Crisco applesauce, nuts raisins. Sift dry ingredients add. Mix well. Put greased floured loaf pan tube pan. Bake loaf pan 350 deg 375 deg 45 60 minutes, layer pan 375 deg 20 minutes tube pan 325 deg 1 hour.

instruction: sugar, shortening, eggs, salt, soda, flour, nuts, bananas
response: Title: Grandma Hanrath'S Banana Breadfort Collins, Colorado. Ingredients: 1 c. sugar, 1/2 c. shortening, 2 eggs (add time), 1 tsp. salt, 2 tsp. soda, 2 c. flour, 1/4 c. nuts, 2 over-ripe bananas (chopped). Directions: Cream sugar shortening. Add eggs, salt soda, bananas flour. Add nuts. Mix well. Bake loaf pan 350 deg 1 hour.

instruction: cake mix, chocolate fudge pudding, sour cream, water, Wesson oil, eggs, Frango
response: Title: Chocolate Frango Mints. Ingredients: 1 pkg. devil's food cake mix, 1 pkg. chocolate fudge pudding mix (instant), 8 oz. sour cream, 3/4 c. water, 1/2 c. Wesson oil, 4 eggs, 6 oz. chopped Frango mints. Directions: Mix ingredients 5 minutes. Scrape bowl often. Last fold chocolate chip mints. Bake 350 deg 35 40 minutes (cake mix directions).

instruction: vegetable oil, soy sauce, garlic
response: Title: Cuddy Farms Marinated Turkey. Ingredients: 2 c. 7-Up Sprite, 1 c. vegetable oil, 1 c. Kikkoman soy sauce, garlic salt. Directions: Buy turkey breast; remove skin bones. Cut pieces size hand. Pour marinade turkey refrigerate 8 hours (up 48 hours). The longer marinates, cooking time takes.

instruction: tomatoes, oil, garlic, tomato paste, peppers, sugar, salt, sweet basil, oregano, Italian seasoning
response: Title: Spaghetti Sauce To Can. Ingredients: 1/2 bushel tomatoes, 1 c. oil, 1/4 c. minced garlic, 6 cans tomato paste, 3 peppers (2 sweet 1 hot), 1 1/2 c. sugar, 1/2 c. salt, 1 Tbsp. sweet basil, 2 Tbsp. oregano, 1 tsp. Italian seasoning. Directions: Cook ground chopped peppers onions oil 1/2 hour. Cook tomatoes garlic juice. Put mill. (I use food processor tomatoes uncooked. I add garlic right juice.) Add peppers onions juice remainder ingredients. Cook approximately 1 hour. Put jars seal. Yields 7 quarts.

instruction: ground beef, tomato juice, oats, egg, onion, pepper, salt
response: Title: Prize-Winning Meat Loaf. Ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. ground beef, 1 c. tomato juice, 3/4 c. oats (uncooked), 1 egg, beaten, 1/4 c. chopped onion, 1/4 tsp. pepper, 1 1/2 tsp. salt. Directions: Mix well. Press firmly 8 1/2 x 4 1/2 x 2 1/2-inch loaf pan. Bake preheated moderate oven. Bake 350 deg 1 hour. Let stand 5 minutes slicing. Makes 8 servings.

instruction: steak, ground black pepper, ground white pepper, vegetable oil, bell peppers, beef stock, salt, ground red pepper, flour, onions, celery
response: Title: Smothered Round Steak(Servings: 4). Ingredients: 2 lb. round steak, 1/2 tsp. ground black pepper, 1 tsp. ground white pepper, 1/2 c. vegetable oil, 2 bell peppers, chopped, 1 c. beef stock water, 2 tsp. salt, 1 tsp. ground red pepper, all-purpose flour (dredging), 3 medium onions, chopped, 1 celery rib, chopped. Directions: Alex Patout says, \"Smothering multipurpose Cajun technique works wonders game snap beans. It's similar rest world knows braising. The ingredients briefly browned sauteed, cooked little liquid low heat long time.\"

instruction: long, cooking oil, tomato sauce, water, brown sugar, mustard, Worcestershire sauce, onion
response: Title: Corral Barbecued Beef Steak Strips. Ingredients: 2 lb. round steak 1/2 3/4-inch thick, sliced strips 1/8-inch (or thinner) 3 1/2 4-inches long (easily sliced partially frozen), 2 Tbsp. cooking oil, 1 (15 oz.) tomato sauce, 1/3 c. water, 2 Tbsp. brown sugar, 1 Tbsp. prepared mustard, 1 tbsp. Worcestershire sauce, 1 medium sized onion, thinly sliced. Directions: Brown strips cooking oil. Pour drippings. Combine tomato sauce, water, brown sugar, mustard Worcestershire sauce. Add sauce onion meat slices. Cover cook slowly, stirring occasionally 30 minutes meat tender. Serve rice buttered noodles. Yields 6 8 servings.

instruction: condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, unsweetened chocolate, nuts, vanilla
response: Title: Easy Fudge. Ingredients: 1 (14 oz.) sweetened condensed milk, 1 (12 oz.) pkg. semi-sweet chocolate chips, 1 (1 oz.) sq. unsweetened chocolate (if desired), 1 1/2 c. chopped nuts (if desired), 1 tsp. vanilla. Directions: Butter square pan, 8 x 8 x 2-inches. Heat milk, chocolate chips unsweetened chocolate low heat, stirring constantly, chocolate melted mixture smooth. Remove heat. Stir nuts vanilla. Spread pan.

instruction: Ground Beef, taco seasoning, beans, onion, salsa, green peppers, Tomato, cheddar cheese, sour cream
response: Title: Taco-Filled Green Pepper. Ingredients: 1 lb. Ground Beef, 1 pkg. taco seasoning, 1 san Kidney beans, 1 onion, chopped, 1 C salsa, 4 green peppers, 1 medium Tomato, chopped, 1/2 C cheddar cheese, shredded, 1/2 C sour cream. Directions: In large skillet, brown ground beef. Drain, stir taco mix, kidney beans, salsa. Bring boil. Reduce heat, let simmer 5 minutes. Cut peppers half clean it. Put peppers boiling water 3 minutes- drain- spoon meat mixture green pepper. Put pepper ungreased pan. Cover, bake 350 degrees 15 20 minutes peppers crispy filling heated through. Top tomatoes, cheese, sour cream.

instruction: milk, sugar, yeast, salt, Crisco oil, flour
response: Title: One Hour Rolls. Ingredients: 1 c. milk, 2 Tbsp. sugar, 1 pkg. dry yeast, 1 Tbsp. salt, 3 Tbsp. Crisco oil, 2 c. plain flour. Directions: Put flour large mixing bowl. Combine sugar, milk, salt oil saucepan heat boiling; remove heat let cool lukewarm. Add yeast mix well. Pour flour stir. Batter sticky. Roll batter floured board cut biscuit cutter. Lightly brush tops melted oleo fold over. Place rolls cookie sheet, warm place let rise 1 hour. Bake 350 deg 20 minutes. Yield: 2 1/2 dozen.

instruction: peaches, fruit cocktail, pineapple, fresh strawberries, red apples, yellow apples, bananas, white grapes, purple grapes
response: Title: Punch Bowl Fruit Salad. Ingredients: 2 large cans sliced peaches, 2 large cans fruit cocktail, 1 large diced pineapple, 1 qt. fresh strawberries, 2 red apples, 2 yellow apples, 4 large ripe bananas, 1 lb. white grapes, 1 lb. purple grapes. Directions: In 6-quart punch bowl mix cans fruit, juice all. Clean slice berries. Wash slice apples; leave peeling apples. Dice apples. Slice bananas. Wash cut grapes half. Mix together. Nuts fruit added.

instruction: chicken cutlets, oil, red vinegar, oregano, garlic salt
response: Title: Summer Chicken. Ingredients: 1 pkg. chicken cutlets, 1/2 c. oil, 1/3 c. red vinegar, 2 Tbsp. oregano, 2 Tbsp. garlic salt. Directions: Double recipe chicken.

instruction: cherry pie mix, deluxe white cake mix, butter, ground nuts
response: Title: Cherry Pizza. Ingredients: 2 cans cherry pie mix, 1 box deluxe white cake mix, 1 stick butter, 1 c. ground nuts. Directions: Grease 9 x 12-inch cake pan. Spread cherry pie mix. Sift cake mix spread dry cherries. Top ground nuts. Melt butter pour top. Bake 45 minutes 350 deg oven.

instruction: eggs, salt, pepper, potatoes, Cheddar cheese, green onions
response: Title: Potato And Cheese Pie. Ingredients: 3 eggs, 1 tsp. salt, 1/4 tsp. pepper, 2 c. half half, 3 c. potatoes, shredded coarse, 1 c. Cheddar cheese, coarsely shredded, 1/3 c. green onions. Directions: Beat eggs, salt pepper blended. Stir half half, potatoes onions. Pour well-greased 8-inch baking dish. Bake 400 deg oven 35 40 minutes, knife inserted center comes clean potatoes tender. Cool rack 5 minutes; cut squares. Makes 4 large servings.

instruction: macaroni, tuna, pimentos, onion
response: Title: Tuna Macaroni Casserole. Ingredients: 1 box macaroni cheese, 1 tuna, drained, 1 small jar pimentos, 1 medium onion, chopped. Directions: Prepare macaroni cheese directed. Add drained tuna, pimento onion. Mix. Serve hot cold.

instruction: hearts, mayonnaise, Parmesan cheese
response: Title: Artichoke Dip. Ingredients: 2 cans jars artichoke hearts, 1 c. mayonnaise, 1 c. Parmesan cheese. Directions: Drain artichokes chop. Mix mayonnaise Parmesan cheese. After mixed, bake, uncovered, 20 30 minutes 350 deg. Serve crackers.

instruction: sour cream, vegetable soup mix, broccoli, Cheddar cheese
response: Title: Broccoli Dip For Crackers. Ingredients: 16 oz. sour cream, 1 pkg. dry vegetable soup mix, 10 oz. pkg. frozen chopped broccoli, thawed drained, 4 6 oz. Cheddar cheese, grated. Directions: Mix sour cream, soup mix, broccoli half cheese. Sprinkle remaining cheese top. Bake 350 deg 30 minutes, uncovered. Serve hot vegetable crackers.

instruction: Salad Supreme, Italian dressing
response: Title: Summer Spaghetti. Ingredients: 1 lb. spaghetti, 1/2 bottle McCormick Salad Supreme (seasoning), 1 bottle Zesty Italian dressing. Directions: Prepare spaghetti package. Drain. Melt little butter it. Marinate overnight Salad Supreme Zesty Italian dressing. Just serving, add cucumbers, tomatoes, green peppers, mushrooms, olives taste want.

instruction: pear halves, lime gelatin, cream cheese, lemon yogurt
response: Title: Pear-Lime Salad. Ingredients: 1 (16 oz.) pear halves, undrained, 1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime gelatin, 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened, 1 (8 oz.) carton lemon yogurt. Directions: Drain pears, reserving juice. Bring juice boil, stirring constantly. Remove heat. Add gelatin, stirring dissolved. Let cool slightly. Coarsely chop pear halves. Combine cream cheese yogurt; beat medium speed electric mixer smooth. Add gelatin beat well. Stir pears. Pour oiled 4-cup mold Pyrex dish. Chill.

instruction: watermelon rind, sugar, apple vinegar, oil, oil of cinnamon
response: Title: Watermelon Rind Pickles. Ingredients: 7 lb. watermelon rind, 7 c. sugar, 2 c. apple vinegar, 1/2 tsp. oil cloves, 1/2 tsp. oil cinnamon. Directions: Trim green pink parts watermelon rind; cut 1-inch cubes. Parboil tender, soft. Drain. Combine sugar, vinegar, oil cloves oil cinnamon; bring boiling pour rind. Let stand overnight. In morning, drain syrup. Heat rind. The morning, heat rind syrup; seal hot, sterilized jars. Makes 8 pints. (Oil cinnamon clove keeps rind clear transparent.)

instruction: chicken, potatoes, onions, corn, English peas, peas, butter beans, tomatoes, tomato juice, macaroni, black pepper, salt, sugar
response: Title: Chicken Stew. Ingredients: 3 lb. chicken, boiled, 4 medium potatoes, diced, 2 medium onions, chopped, 1 (16 oz.) creamed corn, 1 (16 oz.) English peas, 1 (16 oz.) field peas, 1 (16 oz.) butter beans, 1 (16 oz.) tomatoes, 1 (46 oz.) tomato juice, 1 small box macaroni, 1 Tbsp. black pepper, 1 Tbsp. salt, 1 Tbsp. sugar. Directions: Remove chicken bone. Use broth. Mix vegetables macaroni. Add sugar, salt black pepper. Cook vegetables tender medium heat.

instruction: butter, sugar, egg, flour, baking powder, salt, milk, vanilla, brown sugar, cinnamon, butter
response: Title: Quick Coffee Cake(6 Servings). Ingredients: 3 Tbsp. softened butter margarine, 1/2 c. granulated sugar, 1 egg, 1 c. flour, 1 1/4 tsp. baking powder, 1/4 tsp. salt, 1/3 c. milk, 1/4 tsp. vanilla, 1/3 c. brown sugar, packed, 1/2 tsp. cinnamon, 2 Tbsp. butter margarine. Directions: Mix 3 tablespoons fat granulated sugar. Add egg beat creamy. Mix flour, baking powder salt thoroughly. Add sugar mixture alternately milk. Add vanilla. Spread batter evenly greased 8-inch square baking pan. Mix brown sugar cinnamon sprinkle batter. Dot 2 tablespoons fat. Bake 350 deg (moderate oven) 25 30 minutes.

instruction: flour, sugar, baking powder, yeast, buttermilk, soda, margarine, warm water
response: Title: Angel Biscuits. Ingredients: 5 c. flour, 3 Tbsp. sugar, 4 tsp. baking powder, 1 1/2 pkg. dry yeast, 2 c. buttermilk, 1 tsp. soda, 1 1/2 sticks margarine, 1/2 c. warm water. Directions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, soda salt together. Cut margarine, dissolve yeast warm water. Stir buttermilk add dry mixture. Cover chill.

instruction: marshmallows, margarine, peppermint candy, crescent rolls
response: Title: Quick Peppermint Puffs. Ingredients: 8 marshmallows, 2 Tbsp. margarine, melted, 1/4 c. crushed peppermint candy, 1 crescent rolls. Directions: Dip marshmallows melted margarine; roll candy. Wrap crescent triangle marshmallow, completely covering marshmallow square edges dough tightly seal. Dip margarine place greased muffin tin. Bake 375 deg 10 15 minutes; remove pan.

instruction: yellow cake mix, water, brown sugar, butter, eggs, nuts
response: Title: Fruit Pizza. Ingredients: 1 box yellow cake mix, 1/4 c. water, 1/4 c. brown sugar, 1/2 c. soft butter, 2 eggs, 1/2 c. chopped nuts. Directions: Mix ingredients spread 2 greased pizza pans. Bake 350 deg 15-20 minutes.

instruction: flour, sugar, oleo, eggs, chocolate syrup
response: Title: Chocolate Mint Bars. Ingredients: 1 c. flour, 1 c. sugar, 1/2 c. oleo, softened, 4 eggs, 1 chocolate syrup. Directions: Mix bake 9 x 13-inch pan 350 deg 25 30 minutes. Top spring touched lightly; overbake. Cool completely, spread mint layer.

instruction: flour, beer, sugar
response: Title: Beer Bread. Ingredients: 3 c. self rising flour, 1 - 12 oz. beer, 1 Tbsp. sugar. Directions: Stir ingredients greased floured loaf pan. Bake 425 degrees 50 minutes. Drizzle melted butter top.

instruction: margarine, onion, celery, flour, curry powder, mushrooms, cream of celery soup, broccoli, chicken, cheese
response: Title: Chicken Divan. Ingredients: 1/4 c. margarine, 1/4 c. chopped onion (or want), chopped celery taste, 1/4 c. flour, 1/8 tsp. curry powder, 1 sliced mushrooms (save juice), 1 cream celery soup, 1 pkg. chopped broccoli, 1 cubed chicken, shredded Monterey Jack cheese. Directions: Melt margarine skillet; saute onions celery. Remove heat. Stir flour curry powder. Drain mushrooms juice. Add water juice 1/2 cup liquid. Stir liquid soup flour mixture; add mushrooms. Cook thick. Arrange broccoli cubed chicken large baking dish. Spoon sauce chicken. Top grated cheese. Bake 350 deg oven 20 minutes microwave cheese melted.

instruction: flour, baking powder, salt, butter, sugar, egg yolks, vanilla, multi-colored candies
response: Title: Mexican Cookie Rings. Ingredients: 1 1/2 c. sifted flour, 1/2 tsp. baking powder, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/2 c. butter, 2/3 c. sugar, 3 egg yolks, 1 tsp. vanilla, multi-colored candies. Directions: Sift flour, baking powder salt together. Cream butter sugar. Add egg yolks vanilla. Beat light fluffy. Mix sifted dry ingredients. Shape 1-inch balls. Push wooden spoon handle center (twist). Shape rings. Dip cookie candies. Place lightly greased baking sheets. Bake 375 deg oven 10 12 minutes golden brown. Cool racks. Serves 2 dozen.

instruction: ground beef, water, sugar, onion soup, tomatoes, tomato sauce, frozen mixed vegetables
response: Title: Vegetable-Burger Soup. Ingredients: 1/2 lb. ground beef, 2 c. water, 1 tsp. sugar, 1 pkg. Cup-a-Soup onion soup mix (dry), 1 lb. stewed tomatoes, 1 (8 oz.) tomato sauce, 1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen mixed vegetables. Directions: Lightly brown beef soup pot. Drain excess fat. Stir tomatoes, tomato sauce, water, frozen vegetables, soup mix sugar. Bring boil. Reduce heat simmer 20 minutes. Serve.

instruction: chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, green chili salsa sauce, green chilies, milk, onion, corn tortilla
response: Title: Chicken Ole. Ingredients: 4 chicken breasts, cooked, 1 cream chicken soup, 1 cream mushroom soup, 1 green chili salsa sauce, 1 green chilies, 1 c. milk, 1 grated onion, 1 pkg. corn tortilla pieces. Directions: Dice chicken. Mix ingredients together. Let sit overnight. Bake 1 1/2 hours 375 deg.

instruction: cabbage, carrots, green pepper, onion, mayonnaise, vinegar, sugar, celery, salt
response: Title: Creamy Coleslaw(Better Homes And Gardens). Ingredients: 4 c. shredded cabbage, 1/2 c. shredded carrots, 1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper, 2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion, 1/2 c. mayonnaise, 1 Tbsp. vinegar, 2 tsp. sugar, 1 tsp. celery seed, 1/4 tsp. salt. Directions: In large bowl, combine cabbage, carrot, green pepper onion use package slaw mix purchased store.

instruction: flounder, tomatoes, green pepper, lemon juice, salad oil, salt, onion, basil, ground black pepper, drops red pepper sauce, green pepper
response: Title: Creole Flounder. Ingredients: 2 lb. flounder pollack fillets, 1 1/2 c. chopped tomatoes, 1/2 c. chopped green pepper, 1/3 c. lemon juice, 1 Tbsp. salad oil, 2 tsp. salt, 2 tsp. minced onion, 1 tsp. basil leaves, 1/4 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper, 4 drops red pepper sauce, green pepper rings. Directions: Heat oven 500 deg. Place fillets single layer baking dish, 13 1/2 x 9 x 2-inch. Stir remaining ingredients pepper rings. Spoon fillets. Bake 5 8 minutes fish flakes easily fork. Remove fillets warm platter. Garnish green pepper rings. Makes 4 6 servings.

instruction: green beans, yellow beans, kidney beans, sugar, salad oil, vinegar, water
response: Title: Three Bean Salad. Ingredients: 1 green beans, wash drain, 1 yellow beans, wash drain, 1 kidney beans, wash drain, 1 c. sugar, 1/2 c. salad oil, 2/3 c. vinegar, 1/3 c. water. Directions: Mix sugar, salad oil, vinegar water sugar dissolved. Pour beans let stand overnight.

instruction: whole kernel corn, cream-style, sour cream, corn bread, margarine
response: Title: Dave'S Corn Casserole. Ingredients: 1 (16 1/2 oz.) kernel corn, drained, 1 (16 1/2 oz.) cream-style corn, 1 (8 oz.) sour cream, 1 (8 1/2 oz.) pkg. Jiffy corn bread mix, 1 stick margarine. Directions: In bowl, mix corns, sour cream, corn bread mix melted margarine. Pour greased 8 x 8 x 2-inch pan. Bake 350 deg 50 minutes.

instruction: ground beef, onion, tomato soup, noodles, oregano, salt, water, cheese
response: Title: Casserole Italiano. Ingredients: 1 lb. ground beef, 1/3 c. chopped onion, 1 tomato soup, 2 c. cooked wide noodles, 1/2 tsp. oregano, 1/2 tsp. salt, 1/3 c. water, 1 c. cheese. Directions: Brown beef onion seasonings combine 1 1/2-quart casserole soup, water noodles. Place cheese edges. Bake 350 deg 30 minutes.

instruction: cabbage, dry mustard, corned beef, cream of celery soup, onion
response: Title: Corned Beef And Cabbage Casserole. Ingredients: 1 small cabbage, shredded, 1 tsp. dry mustard, 1 corned beef, flaked, 1 cream celery soup, 1 medium chopped onion. Directions: Combine ingredients cook uncovered low heat cabbage crisp-tender, 20 minutes.

instruction: Worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, mayonnaise, egg
response: Title: Crab Cakes. Ingredients: 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce, 2 3 shakes Old Bay, 1 tsp. dry mustard, 2 Tbsp. mayonnaise, 1 egg. Directions: Mix carefully add 1 pound lump crab meat. Mix ahead time refrigerate hold better.

instruction: cream cheese, mayonnaise, taco sauce, green onions, green pepper, tomato, Mozzarella cheese, Cheddar cheese, black olives, tortilla chips
response: Title: Taco Dip. Ingredients: 2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened, 1/2 c. mayonnaise salad dressing, 8 oz. mild taco sauce, 2 4 thinly sliced green onions, 1/2 green pepper, chopped, 1 tomato, chopped, 1 c. Mozzarella cheese, 1 c. Cheddar cheese, 1/2 c. black olives (optional), tortilla chips. Directions: Mix cream cheese mayonnaise. Spread large platter dinner plates. Freeze 15 minutes. Spread taco sauce evenly top. Layer remaining ingredients written order. Serve tortilla chips.

instruction: butter, peanut butter, graham cracker crumbs, coconut, nut meats, vanilla
response: Title: Bonbon Cookies. Ingredients: 1/2 lb. soft butter, 1/2 c. peanut butter, 1/2 lb. graham cracker crumbs, 2 c. coconut, 1/2 c. nut meats (optional), dash vanilla. Directions: Cream butter peanut butter. Add remaining ingredients. Mix form balls (best mix hands) chill hours, day.

instruction: orange sliced candy, Angel, pecans, condensed milk, vanilla, orange flavoring
response: Title: Forever Amber. Ingredients: 1 lb. orange sliced candy, chopped, 2 cans Angel Flake coconut, 2 c. chopped pecans, 2 cans condensed milk, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 tsp. orange flavoring. Directions: Mix together. Spread buttered pan. Bake 30 minutes 275 deg. While hot, sift 1 box powdered sugar it. Drop teaspoons waxed paper. Let dry. If set bottom, turn let continue dry.

instruction: yellow cake, eggs, oleo, nuts, eggs, cream cheese, powdered sugar
response: Title: Gooey Coffee Cake. Ingredients: 1 yellow cake mix, 2 eggs, 1 stick oleo, melted, 1 c. chopped nuts, 2 eggs, 8 oz. softened cream cheese, 1 lb. powdered sugar. Directions: Mix cake mix, 2 eggs melted oleo. Put greased 9 x 13-inch pan. Put chopped nuts mixture. Mix 2 eggs, cream cheese powdered sugar. Add mixture. Bake 15 minutes 325 deg, bake 20 minutes 350 deg.

instruction: pineapple, bananas
response: Title: Phylis' Pineapple-Banana Salad. Ingredients: 1 large chunk pineapple, 4 5 bananas. Directions: Drain pineapple reserve juice. Cut bananas chunks like pineapple.

instruction: cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of celery soup, chicken, butter, rice
response: Title: Chicken Casserole. Ingredients: 1 cream mushroom soup, 1 cream chicken soup, 1 cream celery soup, 1 cut chicken, 1/2 c. melted butter margarine, 1 1/2 c. uncooked rice. Directions: Mix ingredients baking dish. Cover bake 350 deg 2 1/2 hours. Bake 45 minutes, uncovered, brown chicken.

instruction: cream cheese, condensed milk, pineapple, nuts, lemon juice
response: Title: Pineapple Nut Pie. Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, 1 sweetened condensed milk, 1/2 c. crushed pineapple, 1/3 c. chopped nuts, 1/3 c. lemon juice. Directions: Cream cream cheese; add milk beat smooth. Add lemon juice, pineapple nuts. Beat well. Pour graham cracker crust chill. Slice small servings (very rich) dollop Cool Whip.

instruction: vanilla, cream cheese, butter, peanut butter
response: Title: Annie'S Diabetic Candy. Ingredients: 1 (8 oz.) Jell-O sugar-free vanilla French vanilla pudding (put dry), 1 (8 oz.) Philadelphia light cream cheese, 2 Tbsp. butter, 2 Tbsp. peanut butter like. Directions: Mix ingredients, form small balls roll chopped peanuts. Keep refrigerated.

instruction: peaches, sugar, sour cream, lemon juice, vanilla
response: Title: Frozen Peach Mousse. Ingredients: 4 medium peaches, peeled chopped, 1 1 1/4 c. sugar, 1 1/4 c. sour cream (use light), 1/4 c. lemon juice, 3/4 1 tsp. vanilla. Directions: Puree peaches blender. Add remaining ingredients. Blend pour container freeze.

instruction: frozen strawberries, sugar, cream cheese
response: Title: Strawberry Pie. Ingredients: 16 oz. Cool Whip, 2 pkg. frozen strawberries *, 2 (9-inch) deep pan pie crusts, 1 3/4 c. sugar, 12 oz. cream cheese. Directions: *Can use blueberries cherries.

instruction: margarine, graham cracker crumbs, granulated sugar
response: Title: Blueberry Surprise. Ingredients: 1 stick margarine, 1 1/2 c. graham cracker crumbs, 1/4 c. granulated sugar. Directions: Mix ingredients press 2/3 mixture square baking dish. (A bowl diameter used, 1 1/2 2-quart size.)

instruction: flour, baking soda, salt, shortening, sugar, eggs, cocoa, water, vanilla, milk
response: Title: Moist Devil'S Food Cake. Ingredients: 2 c. sifted flour, 1 1/2 tsp. baking soda, 1/4 tsp. salt, 1/2 c. shortening, 1 1/2 c. sugar, 2 eggs, separated, 1/2 c. cocoa, water, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 c. milk. Directions: Sift flour, soda salt; set aside. Combine shortening sugar bowl. Beat creamy. Add egg yolks; beat well. Combine cocoa, water vanilla 1 cup; mix well. Add batter. Add flour mixture alternately milk. Beat addition; set aside. Beat egg whites stiff peaks form beater lifted. Fold batter. Bake 9-inch greased cake pans 375 deg 30 minutes.

instruction: apples, raisins, brown sugar, sugar, shortening, cold water, flour, soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, cloves, salt, nuts
response: Title: Dot'S Civil War Cake. Ingredients: 3 medium apples, chopped, 2 c. raisins, 1 c. brown sugar, 1 c. granulated sugar, 2 Tbsp. shortening, 2 c. cold water, 3 c. flour, 2 tsp. soda, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1 tsp. nutmeg, 1 tsp. cloves, 1 tsp. salt, 1 c. nuts. Directions: Combine cook 6 ingredients. Bring boil boil 5 minutes; cool. Add sifted, dry ingredients apple mixture. Stir blend only. Add nuts. Pour greased floured tube pan. Bake 1 hour 350 deg. Serves 16.

instruction: potatoes, onion, butter, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, Cheddar cheese, cornflakes
response: Title: Potato Casserole. Ingredients: 6 c. diced potatoes, 1/2 c. chopped onion, 3/4 c. melted butter, 1 cream chicken soup, 1 (8 oz.) sour cream, 1 c. grated Cheddar cheese, 2 c. crushed cornflakes. Directions: Peel dice potatoes; place bowl cold, salted water. Drain potatoes dry paper towels. Mix 1/2 cup butter, onions, soup, sour cream cheese; stir well. Add potatoes mixture pour 2 1/2-quart casserole dish. Crush cornflakes, mix remaining butter. Sprinkle cornflakes butter potato mixture. Bake 350 deg 50 minutes.

instruction: vanilla wafers, butter
response: Title: Dream Pie. Ingredients: vanilla wafers, butter. Directions: Mix vanilla wafer crumbs butter.

instruction: sugar, white corn syrup, cold water, egg whites, vanilla, nuts
response: Title: Divinity Fudge. Ingredients: 2 2/3 c. sugar, 2/3 c. white corn syrup (Karo), 2/3 c. cold water, 2 egg whites, 1 tsp. vanilla, 1 c. chopped nuts. Directions: Stir sugar, syrup water. Allow boil stirring forms hard ball cold water. Pour stiffly beaten egg whites, beating constantly. Cool; add vanilla nuts. Beat cool set. Pour buttered platter drop teaspoons waxed paper.

instruction: apples, sugar, cinnamon, sugar, flour, salt, corn flake crumbs, oleo
response: Title: Apple Crisp. Ingredients: apples, 1/2 c. sugar, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1/4 c. sugar, 1 c. flour, dash salt, 1/2 c. corn flake crumbs, 1 stick oleo. Directions: Mix 1/2 cup sugar cinnamon. Spread apples. Mix 1/4 cup sugar, flour, salt, cornflake crumbs oleo. Spread mixture apples.

instruction: Bisquick, sausage, Cheddar cheese
response: Title: Sausage Balls. Ingredients: 2 c. Bisquick, 1 lb. sausage, 8 oz. pkg. Cheddar cheese, grated. Directions: Mix sausage cheese together. Add Bisquick mix thoroughly. Roll medium size balls. Bake 350 deg 15 minutes golden brown.

instruction: chicken, cream of chicken soup, consomme, rice, salt, pepper
response: Title: Consomme Chicken. Ingredients: chicken parts, 1 cream chicken soup, 1 consomme, 2 c. rice, salt taste, pepper taste. Directions: Add liquid chicken soup consomme 4 cups water. Season salt pepper. Cook 350 deg 1 hour.

instruction: celery, onions, butter, ground beef, vinegar, lemon juice, brown sugar, mustard, salt, pepper, catsup, water
response: Title: Spanish Hamburgers. Ingredients: 1/2 c. celery, 2 chopped onions, 2 Tbsp. butter, 1 lb. ground beef, 2 Tbsp. vinegar, 2 Tbsp. lemon juice, 2 Tbsp. brown sugar, 1 1/2 Tbsp. mustard, 1 tsp. salt, 1 1/2 tsp. pepper, 1 c. catsup, 1 c. water. Directions: Brown celery, onions ground beef butter. Add vinegar, lemon juice, brown sugar, mustard, salt, pepper catsup water. Simmer 30 minutes.

instruction: chicken broth, cornstarch, egg, green onion
response: Title: Egg Drop Soup. Ingredients: 2 (13 3/4 oz.) cans chicken broth, 1 Tbsp. cornstarch, 1 beaten egg, 2 Tbsp. sliced (1/4-inch) green onion. Directions: In saucepan slowly stir chicken broth cornstarch. Cook, stirring constantly, slightly thickened. Slowly pour beaten egg; stir gently. Remove heat. Garnish sliced green onion. Makes 4 servings.

instruction: apple juice, allspice, whole cloves, cinnamon, brown sugar
response: Title: Mulled Cider. Ingredients: 1/2 gal. apple juice, 1 tsp. allspice, 1 tsp. cloves, 1 cinnamon stick, 1 c. brown sugar. Directions: Simmer ingredients. Strain warmed mugs top with a dash nutmeg. This recipe doubled times, according number guests present.
